name: The Mutant Spiders
overview: A.K.A. "Commodore Adventure #1". To prevent the world from being overtaken by the mutant spiders you must find their eggs and destroy them before it is too late. Here you will try to save the world from an invasion of giant spiders, but many obstacles will get in your way. You have to get to the area where the spiders are, with all the forces of nature against you..
